definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: Early Europeans believed in evil spirits, witches, ghosts and trolls.
sentences.chinese: 早期歐洲人相信惡鬼，巫婆，鬼，巨魔。

sentences.english: Wear a costume to disguise yourself as one of them.
sentences.chinese: 穿上萬聖節的服裝來僞裝自己是惡鬼兇靈裏的一員。

sentences.english: " Dat Buck two devils, " was Francois's rejoinder.
sentences.chinese: 巴克抵得上兩個惡鬼哩。

sentences.english: The background of that devil is most decisive.
sentences.chinese: 最關鍵的是那惡鬼的來歷。

sentences.english: What the devil kind of knight are you, that can't slay a hedgehog with his naked arse?
sentences.chinese: 你算哪個惡鬼門子的騎士，用光腚都殺不死一隻刺蝟？

sentences.english: Out of pity, the Jade Emperor made him the god in charge of catching evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝憐其不幸，封他爲捉惡鬼之神。

definition: variant of 兇惡|凶恶, fierce/ferocious/fiendish/frightening
to start a rebellion/to rise in revolt
Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
sb who is always hungry/glutton/(Buddhism) hungry ghost
Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
